name: Pokémon Bizarre
storyline: Pokemon Bizarre is a Pokémon Fangame in which you explore the vast and crazy region of Quintueles, filled with weird locations and stupid chharacters that will keep you entertained during your journey. Obtain eight medals and discover the project in which a group of scientists have been working on during the past years and travel to a vaporwave, parallel world thanks to Hoopa's Portals.
summary: Pokémon Bizarre is a Spanish-language fangame created by developer MrGrossi, also author of District Dance Battle, Motor Casa Paco, Vaya Canicastañazos, Mauriçius Nativitatem, FDI, A Toda Pastilla and Louse on the Loose. You will give life to a character who has been forced to explore the quirky and amazing Pokemon region known as Quintueles. In the process you can train up to eight generations of Pokémon, visit eight different gyms, meet new stupid characters and embark on a multitude of missions that involve things such as going to a rave, fight malicious octopuses and chit-chat with the famous "Alien Fumeta".
